title: No. 13, from "Recuëil de Caricatures Dessinées par J. Saly et Gravées par A.L. De Lalive D.J."
description: full-length profile of a very tall, thin man, striding; man wears a long coat, knickers and a three-cornered hat, with a sword at his proper R side
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
artist: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully
